spell_tooltip.description:
Burrow beneath the ground, becoming unattackable, removing movement impairing effects, and increasing your movement speed by 50% for 5 sec.

When the effect ends, enemies within 6 yards are knocked in the air and take 760,186 Physical damage.
Healing Tide Totem's cooldown is reduced by 45 sec and it heals for 25% more each time it pulses.
Heals the friendly target for 446,980, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 455,553, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 452,958, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 462,269 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 464,225 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 466,506 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 309,547 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 113,134 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 12 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.

Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.

Healing from Cloudburst Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 3% for 3 sec.
Purify Spirit additionally removes all Curse effects.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 17,272 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, Ancestral Protection, Earthen Wall, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.

Your Lava Burst and Riptide casts restore 2,625 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 34 yards every 1.5 sec for 9 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 4.1 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 414,647 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 484,477 and an additional 237,234 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 304,441 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.
Deal 76,771 Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.7 sec, healing all party or raid members within 46 yards for 224021.8.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Targets you heal with Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Chain Heal, or Riptide's initial heal gain 5% increased health for 10 sec.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 11 yards by 10%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Casting Lava Burst increases the healing of your next Healing Surge by 30%, stacking up to 2 times.

Healing Surge applies Flame Shock to a nearby enemy when empowered by Master of the Elements.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
Healing Tide Totem now additionally grants 80% increased mana regeneration to allies.
Every third Healing Wave or Healing Surge heals for an additional 50%.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 169,805 over 6 sec.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 1.1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Chain Heal's mana cost is reduced by 10% and Chain Heal increases the initial healing of your next Riptide by 75%, stacking up to 2 times.

When you heal with your Healing Wave, Healing Surge, or Riptide you have a 30% chance to summon an Ancestral spirit to aid you, instantly healing an injured friendly party or raid target within 40 yards for 50% of the amount healed. Critical strikes increase this chance to 60%.

Casting Healing Rain has a 100% chance to activate Downpour, allowing you to cast Downpour within 8 sec.

 Downpour
A burst of water at your Healing Rain's location heals up to 5 injured allies within 12 yards for 351,682 and increases their maximum health by 10% for 6 sec.
Every 1 million mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 1.1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.

Benefiting from Undulation calls an Ancestor to your side for 10 sec.

Casting Unleash Life calls an Ancestor to your side for 16 sec.

Whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Ancestor will cast a similar spell.
Your Ancestors' spells are 25% more powerful.
Ancestors last an additional 4 sec.

Lava Burst gains an additional charge and deals 5% increased damage.

Riptide gains an additional charge and heals for 20% more.
When an Ancestor is called, they reduce the cooldown of Riptide by 3 sec.

Increases your maximum mana by 10%.

Tidal Waves can now stack up to 4 times.
Using spells with a cast time increases the duration of Spiritwalker's Grace and Spiritwalker's Aegis by 1 sec, up to a maximum of 4 sec.
Earth Shield has an additional 3 charges and heals you for 25% more.
Increases the healing done by Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Wellspring, Downpour, and Chain Heal by 25%.

When an Ancestor departs, they cast Hydrobubble on a nearby injured ally.

 Hydrobubble
Surrounds your target in a protective water bubble for 15 sec.

The shield absorbs the next 1.1 million incoming damage, but the absorb amount decays fully over its duration.

Your next healing or damaging spell is instant, costs no mana, and deals 10% increased damage and healing.

If you know Nature's Swiftness, it is replaced by Ancestral Swiftness and causes Ancestral Swiftness to call an Ancestor to your side for 10 sec.
Heals the friendly target for 441,614, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 11 yards by 10%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.
